name: geomodel

conflicts.name: +fullsimlight

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: generator
variants.description: the build system generator to use

variants.name: fsl
variants.description: Enable the build of FSL and FullSimLight

variants.name: hepmc3
variants.description: Build GeoModel tools with support for the HepMC3 exchange format

variants.name: pythia
variants.description: Build GeoModel tools with support for the Pythia event generator

description:
GeoModel is a user-friendly C++ Toolkit and Suite for HEP Detector
Description with minimal dependencies.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: eigen
dependencies.description:
Eigen is a C++ template library for linear algebra matrices, vectors,
numerical solvers, and related algorithms.

dependencies.name: geant4
dependencies.description:
Geant4 is a toolkit for the simulation of the passage of particles
through matter. Its areas of application include high energy, nuclear
and accelerator physics, as well as studies in medical and space
science.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: hepmc3
dependencies.description:
The HepMC package is an object oriented, C++ event record for High
Energy Physics Monte Carlo generators and simulation.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependencies.name: opengl
dependencies.description: Placeholder for external OpenGL libraries from hardware vendors

dependencies.name: pythia8
dependencies.description:
The Pythia program is a standard tool for the generation of events in
high-energy collisions, comprising a coherent set of physics models for
the evolution from a few-body hard process to a complex multiparticle
final state.

dependencies.name: sqlite
dependencies.description:
SQLite is a C-language library that implements a small, fast, self-
contained, high-reliability, full-featured, SQL database engine.

dependencies.name: xerces-c
dependencies.description:
Xerces-C++ is a validating XML parser written in a portable subset of
C++. Xerces-C++ makes it easy to give your application the ability to
read and write XML data. A shared library is provided for parsing,
generating, manipulating, and validating XML documents using the DOM,
SAX, and SAX2 APIs.
